node.title: Ron DeSantis Alleges Critical Race Theory, Equity Training are 'Cottage Industries'
node.description: "Just understand when you hear 'equity' used that it's just an ability for people to smuggle in their ideology," DeSantis said Wednesday.

node.title: Los Angeles schools put off a student vaccine mandate until fall 2022.
node.description: The mandate would have required students 12 and over to be fully vaccinated by Jan. 10 or switch to online learning. Now, unvaccinated students will have to be tested frequently starring in January.

node.title: Derek Chauvin Pleads Guilty to Violating George Floyd’s Rights
node.description: The guilty plea is likely to lengthen the imprisonment of Mr. Chauvin, a former Minneapolis police officer who is already serving a prison sentence of 22 and a half years for murder.

node.title: Omicron COVID Cases May Already Be Peaking Where Outbreak First Started
node.description: Shabir Madhi, professor of vaccinology, told Newsweek that the Omicron wave will likely peak quicker than previous waves because of the new variant's increased transmissibility.

node.title: Is Mark Meadows PowerPoint the Watergate 'Smoking Gun' Tape for Donald Trump?
node.description: Former Watergate Special Prosecutor Jill Wine-Banks tells Newsweek the PowerPoint presentation Mark Meadows handed over to the January 6 House Select Committee might not condemn Donald Trump.

node.title: Missing a Child Tax Credit Payment? Here's What to Do
node.description: Taxpayers can still receive their full refund for the Child Tax Credit but not until next year.

node.title: Biden heads to Kentucky to survey damage from devastating tornadoes
node.description: Mr. Biden will tour neighborhoods in Mayfield and Dawson Springs, two communities devastated by the tornadoes that hit Kentucky on Friday.

node.title: Russian man convicted of state-ordered killing in Germany
node.description: The Kremlin has called the allegations of Russian involvement in the Berlin killing "absolutely groundless."

node.title: Putin and Xi laud close ties amid mounting tension with the West
node.description: The leaders held a friendly video call hours after Russia threatened to "respond militarily" in its standoff with the U.S. and NATO over Ukraine.

node.title: A Spinning Acrobat Learns to Love Change
node.description: The French circus company Libertivore makes its American debut, though its director had to give up her performing career.

node.title: Cuomo Is Ordered to Forfeit Earnings From $5.1 Million Book Deal
node.description: Former Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo received authorization to write the book under false pretenses, the board had previously ruled.

node.title: We’re on the Ground in Kentucky

node.title: Malta Becomes First E.U. Country to Legalize Marijuana
node.description: The government said that the new law was aimed at ending the criminalization of people for smoking the drug and at reducing criminal trafficking.

node.title: Let’s Look Back on 2021, When We Couldn’t Stop Looking Back
node.description: There’s now a thriving cottage industry for content that re-examines the recent past through a contemporary critical lens. Is that a good thing?

node.title: For This Theater Leader, a Mission That Goes Beyond the Stage

node.title: Biden’s China Dilemma: How to Enforce Trump’s Trade Deal
node.description: The Biden administration must decide whether to enforce a Trump-era trade deal that has not fulfilled its promise.

node.title: More Independent Voters Are Opposed to Biden Running in 2024 Than Trump
node.description: Fifty-nine percent of independents said Trump shouldn't run again, compared with 67 percent who said Biden shouldn't seek reelection, a new poll shows.

node.title: When Do Child Tax Credits End? Last Payment and What's Next
node.description: Without action from Congress, families will receive a lesser credit when they file their taxes in 2023.

node.title: Marjorie Taylor Greene Calls Mitch McConnell 'Biden's B*tch' Over Debt Ceiling Vote

node.title: Do The Charges Against Ethan Crumbley's Parents Undermine The Case Against Him?

node.title: House Hunting on Mauritius: Indoor-Outdoor Flow in the Indian Ocean

node.title: COVID restriction opponents suspected of plot to kill German official

node.title: Police say suspect in murder of billionaire and wife was caught on video

node.title: I Watched ‘Encanto’ With My Dad. It Brought Him Back Home.
node.description: The animated Disney movie is set in Colombia, where my father is from — a place he rarely talks about. Would he fall for the film?

node.title: From mandates to masks, how some big companies are adjusting to Omicron.
